reviews: it greatly increased the infrastructure and the speed to launch new product and feature into the marketplace
kubernetes is the gold standard for container orchestration software and we decided to go with ibm cloud kubernetes service since we use other ibm cloud product
while my experience is quite limited , the workshop showed me that it 's a solid product , worth considering when choosing where to run kubernetes
in our company , we have two major product with three environment ( dev , staging , and production )
we thought that cloud container would be better for deploying blockchains and working on them
we are using the ibm k8s service to handle user-submitted private data
we had been using ibm cloud virtual server for a long time for all of our compute workload
we can also have a secure environment in which we can implement a ci cd workflow for the docker container
using kubernetes in our company allows u to manage multiple environment easily
we use it to run cpu intensive workload and ui website
it automates our whole process of software development
currently , we are using it a the primary architecture for our ui and a few of our complex processing process ( pseudo batch processing )
i 'm currently trialing out ibm cloud kubernetes service a part of my independent testing since our platform uses kubernetes as our primary deployment method for our paas
